import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddUser=_ref=>{let{refreshUsers}=_ref;const[newUserName,setNewUserName]=useState("");const addNewUser=async()=>{if(newUserName){await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/users/add",{name:newUserName});setNewUserName("");refreshUsers();// Refresh the user list after adding a new user
}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-user-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:newUserName,onChange:e=>setNewUserName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter new user name",className:"user-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addNewUser,className:"add-button",children:"Add User"})]});};export default AddUser;
